channel.title: Story on Biswajit Sahoo
channel.description: Recent content in Story on Biswajit Sahoo

item.title: Fault Diagnosis of Machines
item.description: This story was originally written for “Augmented Writing Skills for Articulating Research (AWSAR)” award 2018. It is written in a non-technical way so as to be accessible to as many people as possible irrespective of their educational background. The story also featured in the top 100 list of stories for the award. The full list of awardees and the title of their stories can be found here. Prelude Rising sun with its gentle light marks the arrival of morning.
